game.name: Voodoo Fishin'
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An online co-op fishing horror game with up to 4 players. Explore the swamp for the rarest, most valuable fish. Can you make it back alive to sell your catch?
game.shortDescriptionEn: An online co-op fishing horror game with up to 4 players. Explore the swamp for the rarest, most valuable fish. Can you make it back alive to sell your catch?
